issue.title: Build SplitSync
issue.body: Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS.

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 16 project with TypeScript, configure Tailwind CSS, ESLint, Prettier, create package.json with all dependencies (Next.js, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, etc.), set up tsconfig.json, .gitignore, .env.example, and create CI/CD workflow with lint, typecheck, test, and build jobs

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io for real-time updates, and Tailwind CSS. The app will allow users to create groups, add expenses, track balances, and settle debts with real-time synchronization.

pendingEMs.task: Set up Drizzle ORM with PostgreSQL, create database schema for users, groups, expenses, and transactions, configure connection pooling, create migration files, and set up database client utilities
Implement authentication system with NextAuth.js, create login/register pages with forms, handle user sessions, add protected route middleware, and manage user profiles
Create REST API endpoints for groups CRUD operations, expense management, user invitations, and balance calculations with proper validation and error handling
Build Socket.io server for real-time expense updates, group activity feeds, and live balance changes, implement WebSocket event handlers and room management
Create reusable UI components including Button, Input, Card, Modal, Avatar, Badge, and form components with Tailwind CSS styling
Build expense-related components including ExpenseForm, ExpenseList, ExpenseItem, SplitCalculator, and CategorySelector with client-side Socket.io integration
Create group management components including GroupList, GroupCard, CreateGroupModal, MemberList, InviteMemberForm, and GroupSettings
Build main application pages including dashboard, group detail view, expense history, and settlement tracker with data fetching and real-time updates
Implement balance calculation algorithms, debt simplification logic, settlement suggestions, and payment tracking features
Create activity feed, notification system, user profile management, and preferences/settings pages with real-time updates
